__e: I cannot believe Jack is so shallow he couldn't deal with it.
To me anyone else to ask, I would answer something without connections.
I know when a man looks at me, and it's no big deal, it's something superficial that he wants from me.
After reading his books, I realize how superficial I am.
I'm not so shallow that I can't see beyond his big foot.
All his life he's had to deal with people that are so shallow that they can't see beyond his foot thing and he's going to think I'm like that.
For me, there is something deeper going on, beyond this superficial issue of numbers.
Do you want to at least save your son, or to give relief to some shallow woman from somewhere who has no basic principles, and lose both your son and your woman?
Professor, everybody here has a very superficial idea of what the reality is.
